item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: WPML Ready
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
What is WPML?

WPML is a popular WordPress plugin used for creating multilingual websites. The WPML plugin is in use by over 400,000 site owners throughout the world. WPML provides WordPress users will the ability to translate and publish content in different languages. Some plugin highlights include:
  • Advanced features for translation management
  • An interface for professional content translation
  • Ability to run a multilingual website with a single WordPress installation
  • Options to choose from one of 40 different languages to get started

item.title: POST DESIGN
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Design Your Posts With 15 Different Fully Customizable Options

  ZPLUS theme has various options for the adding the blogs to any pages powered with drag n drop Visual Composer. Following are the various options available . - 12 Style Options for blog designs - Select posts from all categories or from specific category only - Number of posts to show - Post Title position and alignment - Post Title font size - Number of Items per row. For Grid and Masonry - (2/3/4 ) - Title Text color - Title Padding - Post Title Separator (Image ) - Category Position ( Available in Blog styles - Small, Medium,Large , Grid and Masonry ) - Category Font Color and Hover Color - Category Design (None, Box, Rounded and Image ) - Continue Reading ( show / Hide ) and Button Color and Hover Color - Social Sharing- Show / Hide and Button Color and Hover Color - Post Meta - Show / Hide - Post Meta Text Color and Hover Color - Blog Design- None, Boxed and Box without padding. - Post Separator- ( image) - Post Filter - Enable / Disable - Post Navigation Type - None, Default, Classic and Load More - CSS Animation Style - Animation Delay - Set in miliseconds Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:

Select From 5 Different Post Slider Options

  The post slider is fully customizable. Checkout the post slider options.
  • Select Post category or posts from all categories
  • Number of Posts
  • Slider height
  • Slider Caption height
  • Slider Caption width
  • Slider Caption Padding(Top, Right, Bottom, Left)
  • Slider Caption Background Image
  • Title Font Size
  • Text Align
  • Title Text Color
  • Category Design - None / Box / Rounded
  • Category Item font Color and Hover Color
  • Category Item Background Color and Hover Color
  • Category Item Border Color
  • Meta Text Color
  • CSS Animation

item.title: PAGE OPTIONS
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Page Options

With ZPLUS Theme you can control every part of the page without touching a single line of code. Checkout the plethora of options for page.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Slider Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Slider Position - Below Header, Above Header and From Top ( for Transparent Header )
  • Slider Type - Revolution Slider , Layer Slider or master Slider ( Only Revolution Slider is packaged with Theme )
  • Select Revolution Slider - Select Slider Name
  • Select Layer Slider - Select Slider Name
  • Select Master Slider - Select Slider Name
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Page Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Featured Image - Show / Hide
  • Video Embed Code- Insert Video Code from Vimeo / Youtube
  • Page Content Top Padding- Set padding. Default is 35 px.
  • Page Content Bottom Padding
  • 100% Width Left/Right Padding
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Header Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Display Header- Show / Hide
  • 100% Header Width - Choose to set header width to 100% of the browser width.
  • Header Background Image
  • Header Background Color (Hex Code)
  • Header Background Opacity
  • 100% Background Image
  • Background Repeat
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Footer Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Display Footer Widget Area - Choose to show or hide the footer.
  • Display Copyright Area- Yes/ No
  • 100% Footer Width - Choose to set footer width to 100% of the browser width.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Sidebar Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Sidebar Position - Select the sidebar position.( Left/ Right / Both / None )
  • Left Sidebar - Select the left sidebar
  • Right Sidebar - Select the right sidebar
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Background Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Layout - Select boxed or wide layout. Full Width / Boxed / Framed
  • Background Image for Outer Area
  • Background Color (Hex Code)
  • 100% Background Image
  • Background Repeat
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Page Titlebar Options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
  • Page Title Bar - Show / Hide
  • Page Title Bar Text Alignment - Left / Right / Center
  • Page Title Bar Text Size
  • Page Title Font Color
  • Page Title Bar Height
  • Page Title Bar Background Position
  • Page Title Bar Background Color
  • Page Title Bar Background Image
  • Parallax Background Image
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Typography- Choose from 600 Plus Google Fonts
item.dc:creator: wrtprss
item.content:encoded:
Headings

Header one

Header two

Header three

Header four

Header five
Header six

Blockquotes

Single line blockquote:
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
Multi line blockquote with a cite reference:
People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. But that's not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully. I'm actually as proud of the things we haven't done as the things I have done. Innovation is saying no to 1,000 things. Steve Jobs - Apple Worldwide Developers' Conference, 1997

Tables

Employee Salary
Jane $1 Because that's all Steve Job' needed for a salary.
John $100K For all the blogging he does.
Jane $100M Pictures are worth a thousand words, right? So Tom x 1,000.
Jane $100B With hair like that?! Enough said...

Definition Lists

Definition List Title
Definition list division.
Startup
A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.
#dowork
Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.
Do It Live
I'll let Bill O'Reilly will explain this one.

Unordered Lists (Nested)

  • List item one
    • List item one
      • List item one
      • List item two
      • List item three
      • List item four
    • List item two
    • List item three
    • List item four
  • List item two
  • List item three
  • List item four

Ordered List (Nested)

  1. List item one
    1. List item one
      1. List item one
      2. List item two
      3. List item three
      4. List item four
    2. List item two
    3. List item three
    4. List item four
  2. List item two
  3. List item three
  4. List item four

HTML Tags

These supported tags come from the WordPress.com code FAQ. Address Tag
1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, CA 95014 United States
Anchor Tag (aka. Link) This is an example of a link. Abbreviation Tag The abbreviation srsly stands for "seriously". Acronym Tag The acronym ftw stands for "for the win". Big Tag These tests are a big deal, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5. Cite Tag "Code is poetry." --Automattic Code Tag You will learn later on in these tests that word-wrap: break-word; will be your best friend. Delete Tag This tag will let you strikeout text, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5 (use the <strike> instead). Emphasize Tag The emphasize tag should italicize text. Insert Tag This tag should denote inserted text. Keyboard Tag This scarcely known tag emulates keyboard text, which is usually styled like the <code> tag. Preformatted Tag This tag styles large blocks of code. 
.post-title {
	margin: 0 0 5px;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 38px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}
Quote Tag Developers, developers, developers... --Steve Ballmer Strong Tag This tag shows bold text. Subscript Tag Getting our science styling on with H2O, which should push the "2" down. Superscript Tag Still sticking with science and Isaac Newton's E = MC2, which should lift the 2 up. Teletype Tag This rarely used tag emulates teletype text, which is usually styled like the <code> tag. Variable Tag This allows you to denote variables.
